name: The Village Alchemist
description:
In the  game you have to survive in a medieval zombie-apocalypse. 
To survive you have to build up walls, which    protect your village.
Another part of the game is, that you have   to brew  a medicine to heal infected  citizens from being zombies.

You can pin up orders so the citizens can help you to find resources  for the walls or the medicine.

But be careful...the zombies are waiting!

Controls:

Move: A/D

Interact: E

Use/Pickup Item: F

Drop/Place Item: Q

Use Inventory: Mouse (wheel)

GUI: Mouse

There are some bug at the moment, we will try to fix them as soon as possible :)
